Articles.Content: We all have those Kerbals who we adore just because of their names. You'll always use them for the big missions and protect them with your life. What names have you gotten? I've gotten Macsy and Danburry, I like to imagine Macsy as a female. I'm not sure what it is about those names that makes me attatched to them.
I look at them as collateral damage.
I like the one that is Billybobda or something. It makes me laugh.

I got Billybobvis Kerman once in .20 and my first reaction was

"Alright, who put bill and bob in the morph machine!?"

I got him when I had bill, bob, and Jeb on missions and no other Kerbals were hired.

I was landing him on the mun when my game crashed and then when I got the game loaded again he had vanished into the mun

R.I.P. Billybobvis Kerman

I like any kerbal i get with "Lud" in there name. Haven't seen any Ludsoe kermans yet.... I assume they are smart enough to avoid the space program at all costs. But I've got "Ludson" and "Ludfurt".

I dont have a picture of Ludson.... He was on my 0.21 sandbox save.

I tend to like "Dildo Kerman", for those who remember him.

And Kerman Kerman.

And Kerbal Kerman.

Yes, all of these were possible before they added a bad name filter.
I have one called Munfel Kerman who im keeping alive for giggles. Also 2x Mac Kerman, badass name
I have a Billy-Bobbery. The name is also perfect as an adjective, as in: Jeb, that was a bone-headed, Billy-Bobbery reentry you just made.

I had a Fredfred Kerman back in .20. He was pretty ace.

Fredfred Kerman: Because one 'Fred' just would not suffice.
"Hadbin Kerman" also billy-bobry and munfield Enory Kerman was my favorite because he was like Jeb. Always smiling he doesn't have a fun name though...

I had a Luney Kerman, who was Jeb-like. He was a hero to us all, until I landed Munlas Kerman while Luney was doing his own landing. When I discovered he went awol, there was a bit of a panic to secure the SRBs.

I have a Billy-Bobbery. The name is also perfect as an adjective, as in: Jeb, that was a bone-headed, Billy-Bobbery reentry you just made.

Yes! that was it. Ahaha. I love that name.

I had an applicant called "Barely Kerman".

Guess he just made the cut to get into the astronaut ranks...
I've had Organ, Dodos, Kirvey, Doodvan, and Munman Kerman before. Yes, Munman.
I was quite fond of Billy-Bobbro.
I have one named lenley he has been attacked by the cracken and survived evey time
I got Burble and Doing Kerman in my 0.21 save. I kept hoping for Going Kerman, but he didn't show up.
Just hired a Philgas Kerman, looks like he will be in my Orbital Refueling Station once I get it up and running.

Bill brought in today the Job Inquiry of his younger, shamefull named brother.

We, the CEO's of KSC, are not sure if we should hire him or not.
Lars Kerman

1. Macsy Kerman. (First female name I found.)

2. Melemy Kerman.

3. Danbury Kerman. (My 'go to' guy for idiotic experiments. he's incredibly brave and REALLY stupid.

4. Sonie Kerman.

5. Munfurt Kerman. (Put him in a Mun Fort)
I got a Rodberry Kerman in a game the other day - reminded me of Gene Roddenberry.

I have a Gerlie Kerman who I'm saving for a special mission. I figure that name needs to get into Kerbal history somehow.

Also, Billy-Bobfred Kerman, the Kerbal with extremely indecisive parents.
I always laught when I see "Maccas Kerman". Here in australia, maccas, is a slang word for a very famous fast food chain...
My favorite would have to be Kerman Kerman. I always thought, "What parents are that increative that they name there own son Kerman?"
